fullplot: Mima leaves the idol group CHAM, in order to pursue her dream as an actress. Mima climbs up the rocky road to success by performing as rape victims and posing nude for magazines, but is haunted by her reflections of the past.
plot: A retired pop-singer-turned-actress' sense of reality is shaken when she is stalked by an obsessed fan and seemingly a ghost of her past.
title: Perfect Blue

tomatoes.consensus: Perfect Blue is overstylized, but its core mystery is always compelling, as are the visual theatrics.
